text: María Elena Meneses Rocha (1 December 1961 - 14 May 2018) was a Mexican journalist and professor and researcher into media, communications and the Internet with the Monterrey Institute of Technology and Higher Education, Mexico City. She was born in Monterrey, Mexico. She lived in Mexico City. She worked for Univision during her early journalist career. Meneses Rocha died in Mexico City on 14 May 2018 of complications from surgery at the age of 56. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Mexican journalists Category:Mexican academics Category:People from Monterrey Category:Writers from Mexico City
title: María Elena Meneses Rocha
